content: button wrap skirt yarn caron simply soft party yarn in silver this skirt uses the solid shell this is the tutorial i used to learn that stitch https //youtu be/1_5phbcvhuu body chain a multiple of 6 stitches chain a length that will fit loosely around the widest part of your hips here is an idea of how many chains you may need based on your size xs 108-114 s 120-126 m 132-144 l 150-162 xl 168-180 2xl 186-192 3xl 198-210 row 1 chain 2 more single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook skip 2 chains and into th next double_crochet 5 times skip 2 chains single_crochet into the next repeat for the entire row you should end on a single_crochet row 2 chain 3 turn your work this counts as a double_crochet stitch double_crochet 2 more times into the single_crochet stitch from the previous row skip the next 2 chains and into the next single_crochet skip 2 stitches and into the next double_crochet 5 times repeat until the end of the row you should end with making 3 double crochets into the last single_crochet then chain one row 3-x repeat these 2 row until your skirt is the length you want here is an idea of how many row you may need xs 31-32 s 32-33 m 33-34 l 34-35 xl 35-36 2xl 36-37 3xl 37-38 buttonholes chain 6 row 1 chain 2 more single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook skip 2 chains and into th next double_crochet 5 times skip 2 chains single_crochet into the next repeat for the entire row you should end on a single_crochet row 2 chain 3 turn your work this counts as a double_crochet stitch double_crochet 2 more times into the single_crochet stitch from the previous row skip the next 2 chains and into the next single_crochet skip 2 stitches and into the next double_crochet 5 times repeat until the end of the row you should end with making 3 double crochets into the last single_crochet then chain one row 3-x repeat these 2 row until this narrow panel is the same number of row as you made the rest of your skirt attach the narrows panel to the rest of your skirt skipping ½ inch sections at the top of the skirt where you will have your buttonholes i had 4 buttons attaching buttons hold your skirt up and wrap it around your body in the way you would wear it with safety pins mark on your skirt where you would need your buttons to hold the skirt in place to account for the difference in the size of my hips and waist my buttons curved in then just attach your buttons where you put your pins border single_crochet around the border of your entire skirt you can do the same color as the body or a complementary color but the border really helps to add some finished edges
